Title: This class went by too fast!
Content: I loved the cooperative nature of this course and felt that I learned a real world skill. Wish it wasn't over already

Title: Super fun course!
Content: This course really allowed us to express our creativity! You learn about User centered design and go through the process in a group of 3.

Title: If you can't draw... it's fine!
Content: I was scared to take this course because I suck at drawing, but this course is so much more than drawing and your lack of artistic skills will not hinder your grade at all.

Title: It was alright
Content: This course is quite challenging when you dont have much experience with web coding. Still passed though!

Title: This was my favourite course!
Content: I love databases so this course was awesome for me. It can be challenging at times. I had a hard time doing normalization.

Title: Most interesting class ever!!
Content: Learned so much about Agile and loved working as a team. I really appreciated the standup meetings with the supervisors.
